name: Mimicmon
description: Mimicmon's design is based on the cages from the early Digimon Virtual Pets  , resembling the cages used in the Digimon Caged Figure series of toys. This cage houses a mysterious shadow creature inside it that has one single eye and several Digimon body parts with one of its arms ending in a flamethrower. It has a chained wrecking ball attached to the underside of its cage body. The DigiCode on the cage's tags reads ZIP ( ZIP ).
